医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新技术可以通过呼吸气体测量凝血酶活性来诊断免疫血栓形成免疫血栓形成或炎症过程中微小血块的形成是脓毒症或重症 COVID-19 患者发病的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Novel-technology-can-diagnose-immunothrombosis-by-measuring-thrombin-activity-through-breath-gas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Novel-technology-can-diagnose-immunothrombosis-by-measuring-thrombin-activity-through-breath-gas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e461caa-2db2-4040-8d72-b984cb82765b Thu, 10 Aug 2023 10:03:24 -0400 Novel technology can diagnose immunothrombosis by measuring thrombin activity through breath gas
发现艾滋病毒进入健康细胞核的新途径2023 年 8 月 10 日发表在《自然通讯》杂志上的一项研究发现，人类免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 利用一种新途径进入健康细胞的细胞核，然后在细胞核中进行复制并继续侵入其他细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-pathway-for-HIV-to-enter-nucleus-of-healthy-cells-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-pathway-for-HIV-to-enter-nucleus-of-healthy-cells-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78341c6b-f370-4a55-9de0-5158f380f00a Thu, 10 Aug 2023 09:39:05 -0400 New pathway for HIV to enter nucleus of healthy cells identified
